GDevelop adalah sebuah pembuat game sumber terbuka. Itu bisa digunakan untuk siapa saja untuk membuat segala jenis permainan 2D.
Use JavaScript with the game engine: Use JavaScript with the game engine
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop telah dibuat dengan cinta oleh
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: yang menambahkan fitur, memperbaiki bugs, mengirim contoh terbaru, menulis panduan, dan membantu komunitas.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB is a very special, one of a kind critter. More specifically, she is the [most amazing cat on the planet](http://lilbub.com)... and her game is made with GDevelop!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: The game is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Berimajinasi dan publikasikan permainan kamu dengan GDevelop. Dibundel dengan panduan dan contoh.
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Berkontribusi untuk GDevelop - Alat membuat permainan HTML5 sumber terbuka
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop adalah sebuah proyek sumber terbuka (bahkan situs ini): semua orang dapat berkontribusi dan memgembangkan perangkat lunak!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Ada berbagai cara kamu bisa berkontribusi di GDevelop, tergantung pada waktumu, kemampuanmu dan apa yang kamu minati.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop and the website can be translated in your language! Translations are done on a website where everyone can get involved.
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Sangat mudah untuk mendapatkan sumber kode pada GDevelop dan memulai memperbaharui banyak hal!
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Forum dan percakapan Discord adalah tempat untuk mendapatkan dan menyalurkan bantuan kepada pengguna GDevelop lainnya!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Ikuti GDevelop di Facebook dan Twitter:
For most beginners and even advanced use: For most beginners and even advanced users, tutorials and help page are the most valuable resources to create great games quickly. On the wiki, you can write tutorials or improve existing ones.
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Unduh GDevelop atau mencoba secara online - membuat permainan tanpa pemograman
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop gratis dan dapat digunakan untuk membuat game profit atau non-profit.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop berjalan pada Windows, macOS dan distribusi Linux terbaru. Kamu bisa juga mencoba secara online menggunakan Chrome, Firefox, atau beberapa web browser terkini.
You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system: You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system. Type `sudo apt-get install libgconf-2-4` in a terminal or install it from your package manager.
To create your first game, start by read: Untuk membuat permainan pertama Anda, mulailah dengan membaca tutorial:
GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop adalah sebuah proyek sumber terbuka Kamu bisa ikut terlibat di komunitas untuk memperbaharuinya!
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: GDevelop 4 masih bisa diunduh. GDevelop 5 juga direkomendasikan untuk semua penggunakan karena GDevelop 4 sudah tidak diperbaharui! Tidak ada dukungan yang bisa disalurkan untuk masa depan GDevelop 4: kami merekomendasikan semua pengguna GDevelop 4 untuk ditingkatkan ke GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Bahkan jika GDevelop 4 mendukung permainan native, kami merekomendasikan mengubah ke GDevelop 5 dan permainan HTML5, yang didukung lebih baik. Permainan native bisa ditambahkan di GDevelop 5 di kemudian hari.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop untuk edukasi - Ajarkan pembuatan permainan
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: Menggunakan GDevelop di dalam kelas sangat memberi kesempatan bagus untuk mempelajari pemograman, membuat permainan, dan mengasah kreatifitas murid.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop telah digunakan di dalam kelas dan kursus online, dengan murid media digital atau anak-anak di kelas satu!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Tolong kirimkan kami foto atau tweet kamu ketika kamu sedang menggunakan GDevelop sebagai pembelajaran!
Make your own Facebook Instant Games wit: Membuat permainan Facebook Instant Games dengan GDevelop - publikasikan permainan kamu untuk Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Dengan GDevelop, kamu bisa ekspor permainan kamu sebagai Facebook Instant Game dalam 2 klik.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Buat aplikasi kamu di Facebook Developers
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: First thing, make sure to have an account on **Facebook Developers**. Create an app and configure it to choose "Games" as its category and enables Instant Games in Products:
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Buka GDevelop dan ekspor untuk Facebook Instant Games
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: In GDevelop, open your game and then the Export window. Choose **Facebook Instant Games**, click on Export and wait a few seconds.
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Go back to your game page on Facebook Developers, choose Web Hosting in the menu and **upload the file** that was exported by GDevelop.
You can also add testers to let your fri: Anda dapat juga menambahkan game uji agar teman anda dapat mencoba game anda.
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Sekarang, buka ponsel kamu dan **open messenger**. Buka sebuah percakapan, pilih permainan dan klik ikon pada permainan kamu untuk memainkannya!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Gunakan fitur Instant Games dan publikasikan permainan kamu!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop gave you access to Instant Games specific features, like the name of the player, to better integrate your game in Messenger conversations.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: When your game is ready, submit it for review by Facebook so that it becomes **available worldwide**!
Read the full step-by-step tutorial: Bacalah lebih lengkap panduan langkah demi langkah
Features of GDevelop - create any kind o: Fitur pada GDevelop - membuat berbagai permainan tanpa koding
GDevelop is bundled with dozens of featu: GDevelop is bundled with dozens of features to imagine and create any kind of games.
Deploy your game everywhere: Distribusikan game kamu ke semua platform
One click export to [Facebook Instant Ga: Ekspor satu klik untuk [Facebook Instant Games](/facebook-instant-games), untuk dimainkan di Messenger.
Export your game [for the web](http://wi: Ekspor permainan kamu [for the web](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/web) dalam satu klik
Export your game to iOS (with [PhoneGap: Ekspor permainan kamu untuk iOS (dengan [PhoneGap Build atau Cordova](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/publishing/android_and_ios_with_cordova))
Publish your game on Kongregate, Itch.io: Publikasikan permainan kamu di Kongregate, Itch.io dan situs permainan lainnya!
Export as a stand-alone executable game: Ekspor sebagai sebuah stand-alone executable game untuk Windows, macOS dan Linux
Learn how to publish your game: Pelajari cara untuk mempublikasikan permainan kamu
Create explosions, fire and impressive e: Membuat ledakan, api dan efek impersif dengan **Particle Emitters**
Draw custom shapes on screen with Shape: Gambar bentuk anda sendiri dengan Shape Painter
Add behaviors to your game objects: Tambahkan perilaku pada objek permainan kamu
Add realistic behavior to your objects: Tambahkan perilaku realistik pada objek kamu
Have your objects move and avoiding obst: Have your objects move and avoiding obstacles
create platformer games in a breeze: create platformer games in a breeze
quickly make your objects draggable with: quickly make your objects draggable with mouse/touch
And more, to automate current tasks and: Dan lebih lagi, untuk mengotomatisasi tugas dan perilaku saat ini dalam beberapa klik!
Design advanced levels and interfaces: Desain level tingkat lanjut dan antarmuka
The scene editor lets you visually edit: Editor adegan memungkinkan Anda mengedit tingkat visual Anda secara visual
Add interfaces and create parallax effec: Tambahkan antarmuka dan membuat efek paralaks
Create your levels dynamically with exte: Buat level Anda secara dinamis dengan layout eksternal
a powerful pixel art and sprite editor: sebuah editor pixel art dan sprite yang kuat
Inspect the content of your game and mak: Inspect the content of your game and make dynamic changes while previewing your game
[monitor the resource expensive spots](h: [monitor the resource expensive spots](http://wiki.compilgames.net/doku.php/gdevelop5/interface/debugger/profile-your-game) in your game
Save player data in browser/local storag: Simpan data pemain di browser/penyimpanan lokal
Full support for sound effects and music: Dukungan penuh untuk suara efek dan musik
Build ambitious games with advanced feat: Membangun permainan ambisius dengan fitur canggih
Communicate with external websites using: Berkomunikasi dengan situs eksternal yang menggunakan permintaan HTTP
Use advanced events: loops, for-each and: Menggunakan event lanjutan: loops, for-each dan bahkan functions
Manipulate variables with arbitrary comp: Manipulate variables with arbitrary complex structures and even JSON support
You can even [use JavaScript to code](/j: You can even [use JavaScript to code](/javascript-game-engine) some parts of your game!
All editors of GDevelop - make platforme: Semua editor pada GDevelop - membuat platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
The interface of GDevelop is made of int: The interface of GDevelop is made of intuitive editors to design your own games from scratch.
See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger: See how to use GDevelop to add a trigger in your game in 90 seconds
Design your own levels with the scene ed: Design your own levels with the scene editor: you can choose objects, put them on the scene, adjust their position and size. You can entirely design your levels with the scene editor. If you want to create complex levels or interfaces, the external layouts allow you to create parts of a level and then reuse them in other scenes.
Get started in 2 minutes: Try GDevelop i: Memulai dalam 2 menit: Mencoba GDevelop di browser kamu
Imagining and creating the rule of your: Imagining and creating the rule of your game does not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
All conditions and actions are available: Semua kondisi dan aksi sudah tersedia di dalam daftar jadi kamu bisa leluasa untuk menjelajahi dan mencari apa yang kamu inginkan untuk membuat aturan dalam permainan kamu.
Learn more about events in the tutorials: Pelajari lebih lanjut tentang event di panduan
Develop space shooter games with GDevelo: Mengembangkan permainan space shooter dengan GDevelop
Everything that is displayed on the scre: Everything that is displayed on the screen of your game is an object. Most objects are called sprites: they are composed of animations and can be used for any animated element. For example, your player, enemies or bonuses to pick.
Other object are also available to creat: Objek lain juga tersedia untuk membuat antarmuka atau membuat efek pada permainan kamu: tulisan, partikel, tiled sprites...
Discover all the objects available in GD: Jelajahi semua objek yang tersedia di GDevelop
All the images and audio files used in y: Semua gambar dan file audio yang digunakan dalam permainan kamu telah terdaftar di editor resource. Ini adalah cara mudah untuk mengatur aset permainan kamu.
GDevelop comes bundled with free assets: GDevelop comes bundled with free assets to get you started! To quickly prototype and create your own assets, GDevelop is also bundled with a powerful pixel art editor called Piskel.
Learn everything about the editors in th: Pelajari apapun tentang editor di dokumentasi
Examples of GDevelop - make platformer,: Examples of GDevelop - make platformer, shooter, rpg, action games...
GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples an: GDevelop is bundled with 80+ examples and starters to get you quickly started, learn or try a specific feature.
These are the examples bundled with GDev: These are the examples bundled with GDevelop. Curious? You can open and try them directly from your browser. GDevelop is fast to start and you'll be playing with the examples in seconds.
Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop o: Learn step-by-step how to use GDevelop or get help about a specific feature: the wiki has tutorials for beginners and a complete documentation for the software.

Made a nice game with GDevelop?: Made a nice game with GDevelop?
We'll love to know about your game and a: Kami akan senang mengetahui permainanmu dan menambahkannya disini. Pastikan bahwa kamu mempunyai screenshot yang bagus dan permainan yang berkualitas tinggi :)
Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, semua permainan dibuat dengan GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side project to our now canceled space exploration roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog was prototyped in late 2016, after which it received a limited early access release on itch.io. Over the course of 2017 the majority of its content was developed and continuous alpha feedback was taken into account. The game was feature-complete in march 2018, after which the release was announced.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l: High replayability, your will evolve a little different on each run
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Tujuh zona dengan komposisi musuh yang berbeda untuk dijelajahi
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming with unlockable mk2 loadouts
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks by Enuit and Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created with GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: Sebuah game retro 8-bit, dengan arts dan soundtrack yang indah, dibuat dengan GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Menggunakan GDevelop, permainan yang dibuat tersedia untuk iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux dan bahkan dipubikasikan sebagai permainan Arcade yang nyata.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: The game was announced for BUB's 5th birthday. To help making it a reality, a Kickstarter was launched so that all BUB's friends around the world can contribute. The kickstarter was initially launched with $100,000 as the goal, but reached $148,000! GOOD JOB BUB.
Beautiful original graphics and animatio: Grafik dan animasi asli yang indah
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Huge variety of unique levels, bosses and enemies
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Alur cerita yang unik dengan tikungan dan kejutan
Item Inventory: collect items to be used: Item Inventory: collect items to be used strategically throughout the game
Tape Deck feature that allows you to sel: Fitur Tape Deck dapat mengijinkanmu untuk memilih musik favoritmu dalam permainan
Ability to revisit and replay levels to: Ability to revisit and replay levels to further your progress and unlock achievements
GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Membuat game tanpa pemrograman - Open source HTML5 dan pembuat game mandiri
GDevelop game maker software - create vi: Perangkat lunak pembuat permainan GDevelop - membuat permainan tanpa koding
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platform game creator designed to be used by everyone - no programming skills required.
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: Dengan GDevelop, kamu bisa membuat proyek sederhana untuk kesenangan atau membuat permainan indie yang ambisius seperti [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) dan [tons of other games](/games-showcase)!
Events - game creation for everyone: Events - kreasi permainan untuk siapa saja
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Apa yang membuat GDevelop unik dan begitu mudah digunakan adalah event. Event adalah cara yang hebat untuk mengekspresikan logika permainan kamu, tanpa harus belajar bahasa pemrograman.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Events being used in GDevelop to create the logic of a game
When Space is pressed, the character ani: Ketika tombol Spasi ditekan, animasi karakter dan suara akan berjalan. Jika sebuah bom menyentuh karakter, mereka akan hancur.
Export your game in one click: Ekspor permainan kamu dalam sekali klik
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux and even [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Membuat permainan untuk iOS, Android, Windows, macOS dan Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, tablet atau seluler: permainan dibuat dengan GDevelop dapat berjalan dimana saja
Express your ideas without being blocked: Express your ideas without being blocked: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) as never been as easy as assembling your ideas with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Tons of examples](/game-examples-starters) are also available and ready to be tried in one click.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Panduan untuk GDevelop dan dokumentasi di Wiki
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Using JavaScript to make your games with GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop supports JavaScript to create your game or extend the game engine.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript can be used to write part of a game, alongside with events
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Add JavaScript code blocks inside your game
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code blocks at any point in the events of your game. It's a good way to implement a complex algorithm or reuse functions from open-source libraries. Events and code blocks can seamlessly be mixed together - so you can implement parts or even the totality of your game with JavaScript!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: The JavaScript editor is based on the super powerful Monaco Editor, extracted from [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompletions are provided and the editor supports advanced features like multi-selection for faster coding.
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop is modular and can be extended to suit your needs. In particular, all features available to games (objects, behaviors, events) are based on the extension system. You can quickly create new extensions for your game or contribute to existing ones as GDevelop is [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD).
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Sprite editor and tools to make your own 8bit games with GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: See Piskel sprite editor being used inside GDevelop to make a 8bit game
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), a powerful and easy to use 2D sprite editor. It's the perfect tool to create pixel art assets to give a retro feeling to your game! You can create objects with multiple animations, edit at any time the sprites and see the result by launching a preview of your game.
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Want to create a retro platformer game? GDevelop has a pre-made behaviors that you can attach to your character and your platforms. In a few seconds you have a basic platformer game running and ready to be customized and enhanced! Other behaviors, conditions and actions can also be used to create any kind of 2D games: shmup, "Bullet Hell", arcade games...

Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
